goal: Arcade Integration Demo: Lunch Recommendations via Google Maps + Gmail
description: Demonstrates Arcade.dev integration with multiple Google services - uses Google Maps to find 3 lunch recommendations and Gmail to email them. Shows per-node toolkit configuration.

nodes.name: Find Lunch Recommendations
nodes.react_goal: Find 3 highly-rated restaurants in San Francisco for lunch today. For each restaurant, get: name, address, rating, and brief description. Make sure to find 3 different restaurants.
nodes.thinking_prompt:
Use Google Maps to search for lunch restaurants in San Francisco. Find 3 different options.

When done: FINAL: [List of 3 restaurants with name, address, rating, and description for each]

nodes.name: Format Recommendations
nodes.prompt:
Format the restaurant recommendations into a simple plain text email. No greetings, no sign-offs, no markdown.

Start with:
Lunch Recommendations for the Day

Then list each of the 3 restaurants with:
- Name
- Address
- Rating (if available)
- Description

Use simple formatting, no special characters or emojis. Keep it clean and readable.
